title: (x) "Tu la conosci Claudia?" Italian movie - Asphalt {Tiff}
content:
Hi, can you help me to identify this type, from a movie’s poster?  
thanks all!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/claudia_3671.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Permastore Tanks & Silos logo - Dynamo, Univers Cond {Akira Yoshino, Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28912 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Digital Entertainment Network" business card - Rotis Sans {Chris Keegan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28926 "Go to next forum topic")
author: franzlt

comments.content:
It looks like a beefed up version of Boton’s [’Chinon’](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143544/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/chinon/), but I’m sure the resemblance is superficial.

- Mike Yanega

It is Asphalt from Font Bureau with the stroke riding on the centerline.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/conosciasphalt_3673.png)
